|ram1_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = E8:DE:27, 64:70:02 |oui = E8:DE:27, 64:70:02 |bootwait = |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = |exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = yes,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = bgn |defaulip = 192.168.0.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = TP-LINK_XXXXXX |defaultssid_regex = ^TP-LINK_[0-9A-F]{6}$ |default_ch = |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt (Was) |availability = Discontinued |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 10/30/2012 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = 320127552672 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B003WK62OS |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== :Ports: 1x WAN FE, 4x LAN FE, 1x USB 2.0 :WLAN: 802.11bgn 2T2R 2.4GHz (300Mbps) :Antenna: 2x 5dBi external (RP-SMA) :Ports: 1x WAN FE, 4x LAN FE, 1x USB 2.0 :Compatible with UMTS/HSPA/EVDO USB Modem The Flash appears to be a ''Spansion'' S25FL032PIF (4MB) Possible 64:70:02 (''TP-LINK'') OUI (in the FCC photos) ==Links of Interest== *[https://oldwiki.archive.openwrt.org/toh/tp-link/tl-mr3420#info ''TP-LINK TL-MR3420'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] 
Hardware Info
Model:		MR3420			MR3420
Version:	1/1.1/1.2		2.3
Manufacturer:	Atheros 		Atheros
Bootloader:	U-Boot			U-Boot
Architecture:	MIPS 24Kc		MIPS 74Kc
System-On-Chip:	Atheros AR7241@400MHz	Atheros AR9341@535MHz
Flash chip:	Macronix MX25L3206E/	Winbond W25Q32BV/
		cFeon F32-100HIP	Spansion FL032PIF
Flash size:	4 MiB 			4 MiB
RAM chip:	Zentel A3S56D40FTP-G5	Winbond W9425G6JH-5
RAM size:	32 MiB	 		32 MiB
Wireless:	Atheros AR9287 (2T2R)	Atheros AR9341 (2T2R)
Antenae(s):	2 Removables x 3dBi	2 Removables x 3dBi
Ethernet:	Atheros AG71xx 4x LAN, 1x WAN 100/10	
USB:		1 x 2.0
Serial:		Unfriendly	
JTAG:		No
